Explanation:
In Salesforce, active currencies are located in the Company Profile section. This is where the currency settings are configured, and you can manage the active currencies used in the organization, particularly in multi-currency environments.
 • A. Security Control: This is not the location for active currencies.
 • B. User record (Personal Setup): While users can select their preferred currency on their personal setup page, active currencies are set at the company level, not at the individual user level.
 • D. None of the above: This option is incorrect because the correct location is the Company Profile.
